Martin executes a GET on the resource /employee/{employee_id}

testSteps.description: Then he should get the correct information

children.description: For Martin: the response status code should be 200
For Martin: Employee information should be Employee (id = 58028, name = Gale Kemmer DVM-1572634684, age = 22, salary = 3408 profile_image = No image)
